mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT3062SaishinsaMoshitate" AS DbT3062 WHERE ( DbT3062."kokuhorenSofuYM" IS NULL OR DbT3062."kokuhorenSofuYM" = ''
OR DbT3062."kokuhorenSofuYM" = #{処理年月}
OR DbT3062."kokuhirenSaiSofuAriFlag" = true ) AND DbT3062."serviceTeikyoYM" <= #{処理年月} AND DbT3062."isDeleted" = false ORDER BY DbT3062."jigyoshoNo" ASC, DbT3062."hiHokenshaNo" ASC, DbT3062."serviceTeikyoYM" ASC, DbT3062."serviceTeikyoShuruiCode" ASC, DbT3062."serviceKomokuCode" ASC, DbT3062."rirekiNo" ASC
